name: MBM International
tagline: Make Your Ideas Work // We have a track record of successful projects with top level international corporations and startups. With our resources we support partners and customers with software development, hardware development, consulting and research services around the world. We are dedicated to make your ideas work. //
body:
##Software & Hardware
We are experts in developing solutions based on Open Source software and hardware. Our projects range from small to large scale. Using distributed development tools and technologies we develop projects in our offices in Vietnam as well as with our network of developers in India, Latin America and around the world.

##Consulting
With constant tech developments new opportunities and challenges permanently arise. Facilitators become a necessity in long-standing operations. Existing businesses require continuous adaption and implementations of new processes to compete. In a startup resources to establish your business require a strong focus on the core idea. We are the partner to support your growth. Our consultants achieve the goals we set together.

##ICT Research & Development
We conduct market research throughout Asia, BRIC and EMEA and develop strategies to approach the market and expand your business.

***
##The Founders
**Mario Behling** is an entrepreneur who grew up in East-Berlin during the fall of the Berlin wall. He is a Linux expert and the founder of the light Ubuntu distribution, Lubuntu. Mario organized numerous enterprise matchmaking events like FOSS Bridge, deployed WiFi mesh networks in Afghanistan, and started the FOSSASIA community. He works with the open hardware project Crypto Stick, and engages with the FashionTec community in Europe. Mario also build a hotel, set up a tour company in Vietnam and made a film in the Ukraine.

**Hong Phuc Dang** lived several years in the US and Singapore after her childhood in Vietnam. She is widely recognized as an Open Source community and graphics software expert. She has worked on research projects for top International data research companies. Hong Phuc has spoken at numerous International conferences and organized GNOME.Asia and FOSSASIA events.

***
## The Company
MBM International was founded in 2009 by Mario Behling (Germany) and DANG Hong Phuc (Vietnam/Singapore). Since its inception the goal of the company is to lead international corporations and technology startups towards producing higher revenue generating products.

The company builds its operations on the basis of its internationally experienced staff and a proven track record of its founders. We enable our clients to provide better services and products. We are:

* Using latest technologies to solve real world problems
* Offering our experience of over 10 years in the regions market with company's top management from Germany, Japan and Vietnam
* Working efficiently across languages and cultural barriers
* Providing direct access to top regional and national decision makers
* Adhering to highest standards with management best practices, and certified SCRUM Masters for software development
* Advancing customers to next level with distributed business technologies, git development, and tracking systems
* Delivering outstanding business services with international consultants in Vietnam, China, Cambodia, Myanmar, and Singapore

### Our Track Record
* Successfully completed projects for world leading companies such as Swiss Post Solutions, Dutch Post, Google, Canonical, Sun Microsystems
* Planned and deployed responsive web technologies for customers from zero to market
* Developed Mobile Apps ready for markets
* Unfolded the developer and tech community in Asia and developed a unique talent pool with our FOSSASIA network
* Finalized the development of important milestones of hardware project Crypto Stick
* Set up commercial WiFi networks with customized OpenWrt distribution in Vietnam and Cambodia
* Contributed centrally to international research reports on region including on ICT in Myanmar and Vietnam
* Conducted research, planned and implemented training programs over a 5 year period for development partners including GIZ (German Development cooperation), Australian Aid, Development Aid Sweden, Open Institute Cambodia, Development Innovations and USAID
* Organized large scale developer conferences in Vietnam, Cambodia, and Singapore including GNOME.Asia, FOSSASIA, and Barcamps

***
##Careers
You are eager to learn constantly, to explore and to work with new technologies? Do you want to work in an international environment? Are you able to actively collaborate with people and organizations in your local environment and across the globe? Do you believe in sharing knowledge with your partners to achieve the best possible outcome? Please send us your CV at careers@mbm.vn.

***
##Contact
**MBM International Berlin Office**, Mario Behling, Singerstrasse 117, 10179 Berlin, Germany  |  Phone +49 30 88764502  |  Fax: +49 3 21 21 21 89 71  | Email: contact@mbm.vn

**MBM International Ltd. Vietnam**, Cong Ty Mat Biec  |  93 Mau Than, Xuan Khanh, Ninh Kieu, 9000 Can Tho City |  Phone: +84 710 3 834 283   |  Email: info@mbm.vn
